DOC.brief_title: Protocol Women Increased Risk Developing Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . To correlate establish risk biomarkers cytomorphology obtain random periareolar fine needle aspiration ( RPFNA ) , mammographic breast density , serum bioavailable estradiol IGF-1/IGFBP-3 5-10 year Gail risk estimate . Where available , appropriate safe guard maintain status breast cancer susceptibility gene may include . 2 . To determine relative predictive value establish risk biomarkers development DCIS and/or invasive cancer . 3 . To evaluate potential new breast tissue-based biomarkers include Ki-67 , PCNA , ER , COX-2 , aromatase , methylation key tumor suppressor gene ( i.e. , RAR , p16 , etc ) , proteomic pattern RPFNA nipple aspirate fluid ( NAF ) , well NAF hormone level , correlate risk biomarkers list 1 . 4 . To determine prevalence polymorphisms panel gene important hormone xenobiotic metabolism well DNA repair correlate polymorphism establish risk biomarkers list 1 , well development DCIS invasive cancer . 5 . To maintain contact initially identify cohort high risk woman , acquire demographic data , biologic specimen data follow prospectively development .
